## IgnoredInterceptorsMiddleware class

Middleware that is used for adding support for ignored interceptors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class IgnoredInterceptorsMiddleware implements RestMiddleware 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
